description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE FOR ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF EXTENSION WITH 2X ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE & ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY OUTBUILDING
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations (rear roof extension) would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations (insertion of 2 x roof lights to the front roof slope) would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations (erection of a single storey outbuilding) would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class E. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
